data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This prosaic heading got my attention. The ____ that ____ appears ____ rely ____ a ____ book's ____ regarding ____ influence ____ the DeBeers corporation ____ the ____ of ____ San ____ their ____ lands. DeBeers is not mentioned in the news article about the UN report, nor is it mentioned in the wiki article linked from "See Also".
data.partBlankContent: This prosaic heading got my attention. The para_____ that fol____ appears t_ rely up__ a sin___ book's cla___ regarding t__ influence o_ the DeBeers corporation o_ the rem____ of t__ San fr__ their nat___ lands. DeBeers is not mentioned in the news article about the UN report, nor is it mentioned in the wiki article linked from "See Also".
data.answer: 这个乏味的标题引起了我的注意。下面这一段似乎仅依靠一本书的说法，即德比尔斯公司对将桑人从他们的故土上驱逐的影响。关于联合国报告的新闻文章中没有提到德比尔斯，维基上链接的文章中也没有提到它。
